You're leaving out critical information my man ;D
Make sure that you have smbclient installed, no errors about hal/dbus (if you are in Gnome) - and double check your Vmware network settings - they do have some warnings/tricks in that section.
Oh, also make sure that your actual box and the emulated system do not share the same address - that will block one of them out on some routers.
